TunableList.name: STARTUP_BUCKETS
TunableList.description: PLEASE CHECK WITH YOUR GPE PARTNER BEFORE ADDING TO THIS SET! A set of buckets that we want to schedule on initial startup. We will run an initial scoring of nodes within these buckets the first time a game is loaded. This should mainly be used if there is a need to have nodes schedule immediately when the player begins playing and they cannot wait until the next scheduling ping. Ex. Auditions for the acting career are represented as Drama Nodes that the player can sign up for. When the player begins playing the game they shouldn't have to wait until the next day for auditions to be available for them to sign up for.

TunableEnum.description: The bucket that we are going to score this node in.
